# Public Finance & Regulation â€“ Regulatory Frameworks

## Framework Scope
This domain enforces compliance with:
- National financial regulations
- Public accounting standards
- Government reporting requirements
- International public finance obligations (where applicable)

## Enforcement Rules
- Regulatory frameworks must be applied consistently.
- Interpretation of regulations must be documented.
- Compliance outcomes must be traceable.

## Forbidden
- Selective application of regulations
- Informal regulatory interpretation
- Undocumented compliance decisions
